prompt: In a sleek fashion studio with a dark backdrop, a confident young man dressed in a bold pink fur coat and silver chains poses with poise and intensity. His fingers frame his face in a composed, stylish gesture. As the camera lingers in a slow push-in, his eyes begin to glow â€” not white, but a deep, luminous pink. The pink light pulses softly from his pupils, reflecting on his rings and the silky texture of his coat. The glow gives a surreal, futuristic edge to his regal presence. His expression remains calm, almost indifferent, as the eyes continue to burn with elegant energy. The ambient lighting stays moody and focused, with the glowing pink eyes becoming the visual centerpiece of the shot.

A muscular man with dark metallic skin stands shirtless, facing the camera directly. His blue glowing eyes pulse with power. Sudden arcs of lightning flicker around his body, crawling across the background walls and flickering in rhythm. The camera slowly pulls back, capturing his intense expression and electric energy. No smoke is present. The lighting is cinematic and warm, creating sharp reflections on his skin. The atmosphere is tense, clean, and supernatural.
